input.sentences: old tombstones are an art of sorts .
this partially carved stone is from the early 1800 's .
this is a statue type marker .
simple and humble would describe this gravestone .
it is unusual to find names engraved on stone tops .
output.sentences: Tombstones contain all sorts of art.
Some of the stones are partially carved with words and testimony.
Some graves have markers other than classic tombstones.
My favorite are the simple humble gravestones.
I like them much better than the unusually shaped ones.
